Reminder: Don't Miss Out!

Dear Valued Guest,

This is a friendly reminder about the upcoming UAE Property Expo ‚Äì Muscat. The event is just around the corner, and we don't want you to miss this exceptional opportunity!

üìÖ 26‚Äì27 December 2025

üìç Grand Hyatt, Muscat

What to expect:

  • Exclusive luxury properties from top UAE developers
  • Direct access to property experts and consultants
  • Special expo-only promotions and financing options
  • Market insights and investment opportunities
  • Networking with industry professionals

Secure your spot today and be part of this premier real estate event!
